name: SOVA Aero Night Guard with Case - 1.6mm Thin - Custom-Molded Fit - Protects Against Nighttime Teeth Grinding & Clenching - Odor & Taste Free - Remoldable Up to 20 Times - Non Toxic
short_description: SOVA NIGHT GUARD - Pre-formed for fast fitting & custom comfort, this night guard is designed to protect teeth from a night of grinding. At just 1.6mm thick, the odor- and taste-free guard promotes airflow, so you can breathe & drink while wearing.

PROTECTION - Equipped with Diffusix Technology, its shape and perforations absorb impact and withstand extreme nighttime teeth grinding and teeth clenching, providing relief from headaches, damaged teeth, jaw pain, and bruxism caused by TMJ.
REMOLDABLE - This adult-sized night guard is remoldable up to 20 times and works with ortho appliances.
NON TOXIC - This mouthguard is free of BPA, BPS, latex, PVC, and phthalates.
INCLUDES CASE - The included lightweight, durable case provides a clean and safe place to store your night guard when not in use.

INDUSTRY-LEADING NIGHT GUARDS - With unmatched quality & functionality, SOVA has revolutionized night guard technology. Our guards are known for their protection, comfort, cleanliness & remoldability—helping people get a good night of rest.

name: Custom Fit Night Guards – 8 Pack Moldable Dental Mouth Guard for Nighttime Grinding and Clenching – Easy Fit, 2 Travel Cases Included – BPA-Free Trimmable Protection for Men and Women
short_description: Custom Fit for Nighttime Comfort: Experience a personalized fit with 8 moldable guards designed to stay securely in place. The easy hot-water molding process creates a custom impression that contours to your teeth, preventing shifting and ensuring a restful night without discomfort.

Dual Sizes for a Universal Fit: Our set includes 4 medium and 4 large guards, ensuring the right fit for adults and young adults alike. Each guard is easily trimmable, allowing you to customize the length and height for maximum comfort and a low-profile feel.

Advanced Protection for Tooth Enamel: Safeguard your teeth from the effects of nighttime grinding and clenching. These durable, BPA-free guards provide a resilient barrier that protects your enamel, helping to reduce tooth sensitivity and maintain your natural smile.

Simple & Quick At-Home Molding: Create a professional-feeling impression in minutes using only hot water. Our premium, high-quality material is designed to maintain its shape over time, providing long-lasting protection and consistent nightly comfort.

Hygienic & Travel-Ready Storage: Keep your guards clean and fresh with the two included ventilated travel cases. Designed for breathability, these cases prevent moisture buildup, making it easy to protect your guards at home, at the gym, or while traveling.

Versatile Multi-Purpose Design: While optimized for nighttime use, these guards offer versatile protection for various needs. They are perfect for managing nighttime clenching or as a protective barrier during light-impact athletic activities like basketball or soccer.
